refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the name of the specified field in a result

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: fbsql_field_name returns the name of the specified field index. result must be a valid result identifier and field_index is the numerical offset of the field.

note.para: e.g. The index of the third field would actually be 2, the index of the fourth field would be 3 and so on.

example.title: fbsql_field_name example

refsect1.para:
The above example would produce the following output:
user_id password
